title: BS Ban
body: So I get home from work and all I wanted was a quick game of League then bed. Instead I get into the loading screen everyone is loading up normal except me and akali. I was waiting for about 2 minutes, I got upto about 70% and akali was on 0 so I ALT TAB to play some music while i wait and then I see an alert saying something like, game failed please try again press ok, i press ok go to the after game screen and then it says leavebuster 5 games 20 minutes. So yeah it would be sick if you could fix this up cause this is just that triggering. <3

replies.body: no reply fair fair. TY for the help
So I just read the thing about leaving and if i have to wait an hour just to play league that is the dumbest thing ive ever heard
wow lmao dont worry just read the ticket thing
